texts.name: investigation_barn_one.mp3
texts.text: Look at that shit here. What happened here?

texts.name: investigation_barn_two.mp3
texts.text: Looks like they put them here together to keep them quiet.

texts.name: investigation_barn_three.mp3
texts.text: What a mess. Search for any survivor, we need some information!

texts.name: investigation_barn_four.mp3
texts.text: Looks bad Captain, seems like they've been tortured and thrown away. Some of them are dead for days.

texts.name: investigation_barn_six.mp3
texts.text: Commander Williams, coming. We managed to infiltrate the base and found lots of dead bodies. Looks like they were all rebels.

texts.name: investigation_barn_seven.mp3
texts.text: Lieutenant Wilson, we need some evidence. We talk later.

texts.name: investigation_barn_eight.mp3
texts.text: Ok guys, let's take some pictures and then we get the hell out of here.
